title: Лаптоп LENOVO LOQ 15IAX9 i5-12450HX/16GB DDR5/512GB/RTX 2050 4GB
description:
Лаптоп
Дисплеј:15.6" (39.5cm)
Резолуција:FHD (1920x1080) IPS 300nits Anti-glare, 100% sRGB, 144Hz, G-SYNC®
Процесор:Intel® Core™ i5-12450HX, 8C (4P + 4E) / 12T, P-core up to 4.4GHz, E-core up to 3.1GHz, 12MB
Графика:NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 2050 4GB GDDR6, Boost Clock 1575MHz, TGP 65W
Внатрешна меморија:16GB DDR5-4800
Меморија:512GB SSD M.2 2242 PCIe® 4.0x4 NVMe®
Без оперативен систем
Аудио:High Definition (HD) Audio, Realtek® ALC3287 codec
Звучник:Stereo speakers, 2W x2, optimized with Nahimic Audio
Камера:HD 720p with E-shutter
Микрофон:2x, Array
Ethernet:100/1000M (RJ-45)
Wi-Fi® 6, 11ax 2x2 + BT5.2
White Backlit
Порти:
3x USB-A (USB 5Gbps / USB 3.2 Gen 1)
1x USB-C® (USB 10Gbps / USB 3.2 Gen 2), with PD 140W and DisplayPort™ 1.4
1x HDMI® 2.1, up to 8K/60Hz
1x Headphone / microphone combo jack (3.5mm)
1x Ethernet (RJ-45)
1x Power connector
Power Adapter:135W Slim Tip (3-pin)
Батерија:Integrated 60Wh

features.audio_feature_1: Stereo speakers, 2W x2, optimized with Nahimic Audio
